rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
AI 模型在多个数据源中高精度地彻底改变了痴呆症诊断研究人员开发了一种利用多模态数据的人工智能模型来准确诊断不同类型的痴呆症，从而加强早期和个性化治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/AI-model-revolutionizes-dementia-diagnosis-with-high-accuracy-across-multiple-data-sources.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/AI-model-revolutionizes-dementia-diagnosis-with-high-accuracy-across-multiple-data-sources.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=38a05d4b-308d-4a9c-b822-845af62c8241 Mon, 08 Jul 2024 02:03:00 -0400 AI model revolutionizes dementia diagnosis with high accuracy across multiple data sources
新模型可以帮助了解怀孕期间食用鱼类的风险和益处研究人员开发的新模型可以帮助制定指导方针，并改进关于食用鱼类的风险和益处的循证建议，尤其是在怀孕期间。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/New-model-could-help-inform-the-risks-and-benefits-of-fish-conspiration-during-pregnancy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/New-model-could-help-inform-the-risks-and-benefits-of-fish-conspiration-during-pregnancy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=817c692c-9af9-4262-b437-8da54df5045a Mon, 08 Jul 2024 01:51:00 -0400 New model could help inform the risks and benefits of fish consumption during pregnancy
TRPC5基因在肥胖和产后抑郁症中的作用的发现为新疗法带来了希望科学家们发现了一种基因，如果缺失或受损，就会导致肥胖、行为问题，以及母亲的产后抑郁症。今天在《细胞》杂志上报道的这一发现可能对治疗产后抑郁症产生更广泛的影响，一项针对小鼠的研究表明催产素可以缓解症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Discovery-of-TRPC5-genes-role-in-obesity-and-postnatal-depression-offers-hope-for-new-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Discovery-of-TRPC5-genes-role-in-obesity-and-postnatal-depression-offers-hope-for-new-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3099071a-8608-46d2-9830-8f107afa4977 Mon, 08 Jul 2024 01:48:00 -0400 Discovery of TRPC5 gene's role in obesity and postnatal depression offers hope for new treatments
南澳大学的“小步骤”计划促进更健康的生活方式，以降低痴呆症风险无论是更多的睡眠还是更多的锻炼，简单的生活方式改变都可以降低患痴呆症的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/UniSAs-Small-Steps-program-promotes-healthier-lifestyles-to-reduce-dementia-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/UniSAs-Small-Steps-program-promotes-healthier-lifestyles-to-reduce-dementia-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c174876c-85bd-49ca-80c5-d9f1d3cedd94 Mon, 08 Jul 2024 01:43:00 -0400 UniSA's 'Small Steps' program promotes healthier lifestyles to reduce dementia risk
日本研究显示，妊娠期体重过度增加与产程延长有关研究人员发现，怀孕期间体重过度增加会显着增加日本女性产程延长的风险，强调监测体重增加以预防并发症的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Excessive-pregnancy-weight-gain-linked-to-prolonged-labor- Japanese-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Excessive-pregnancy-weight-gain-linked-to-prolonged-labor- Japanese-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4731904c-60e3-4915-a0b3-df5bd528b9e1 Mon, 08 Jul 2024 01:39:00 -0400 Excessive pregnancy weight gain linked to prolonged labor, Japanese study reveals
同时使用烟草和大麻的青少年面临更高的心理健康风险研究人员发现，美国青少年同时使用烟草和大麻与较高程度的心理健康问题有关，包括焦虑、抑郁和攻击行为。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Teenagers-using-both-tobacco-and-cannabis-face-higher-mental-health-risks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Teenagers-using-both-tobacco-and-cannabis-face-higher-mental-health-risks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ba2255a1-f8c9-4d0d-914a-051497a842df Mon, 08 Jul 2024 01:31:00 -0400 Teenagers using both tobacco and cannabis face higher mental health risks
科学家鉴定出超过 5000 个高风险癌症基因变异科学家们已经确定了超过 5,000 种导致某些癌症发生的基因变异，以及治疗甚至预防这些癌症发生的潜在治疗靶点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Scientists-identify-over-5000-high-risk-cancer-gene-variants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Scientists-identify-over-5000-high-risk-cancer-gene-variants.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=82be5715-077f-4d8a-956b-535243e70d14 Mon, 08 Jul 2024 01:24:00 -0400 Scientists identify over 5000 high-risk cancer gene variants
COVID-19 疫苗接种可减少儿童哮喘症状研究人员发现，较高的 COVID-19 疫苗接种率与儿童哮喘症状的减轻有关，这凸显了流感大流行期间疫苗接种对健康更广泛的益处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/COVID-19-vaccination-linked-to-reduced-symptomatic-child-asthma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/COVID-19-vaccination-linked-to-reduced-symptomatic-child-asthma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6f63681d-a6ec-4922-8566-97d101127cf9 Mon, 08 Jul 2024 01:19:00 -0400 COVID-19 vaccination linked to reduced symptomatic child asthma
研究发现主观认知能力下降可预测未来患痴呆症的风险《美国医学会杂志精神病学》的一项研究发现，主观认知能力下降 (SCD) 可以显着预测老年人患轻度认知障碍 (MCI)、阿尔茨海默病 (AD) 和全因痴呆的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240707/Subjective-cognitive-decline-predicts-future-dementia-risk-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240707/Subjective-cognitive-decline-predicts-future-dementia-risk-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1771934b-4d58-4a43-8f71-c810fac8bfd1 Sun, 07 Jul 2024 23:12:00 -0400 Subjective cognitive decline predicts future dementia risk, study finds
神经肌肉训练可减少化疗引起的神经病变并改善患者预后研究人员发现，神经肌肉训练可显着降低化疗引起的周围神经病变的发生率和严重程度，从而改善患者的生活质量和治疗结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240707/Neuromuscular-training-reduces-chemotherapy-induced-neuropathy-and-improves-patent-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240707/Neuromuscular-training-reduces-chemotherapy-induced-neuropathy-and-improves-patent-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1fb2729f-2765-447b-9b25-370564f3646f Sun, 07 Jul 2024 22:52:00 -0400 Neuromuscular training reduces chemotherapy-induced neuropathy and improves patient outcomes
